author: fabiocos
body:
#### PR description:

Action based on the discussion #28436 and the (null) feedback received so far in https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/swDevelopment/3544.html 
In any case the qt external tool is being removed from future architectures (gcc900, cc8), so in any case this package could be used only based on a local qt installation (in case resurrected or not removed).
title: Remove FWCore/GuiBrowsers
